Song.title: Found In You
Song.copyright: Andi Rozier / Jason Ingram / Paul Baloche

Arrangement.text:
Intro: F C Am G
VERSE 1: We're reaching o[F]ut to wel[Am]come You, G[G]od Fill this pl[F]ace ag[Am]ain with Your s[G]ong Flood our tho[F]ughts with wo[Am]nder and a[G]we Give us a gr[F]eater glimpse of a n[Am]ever-changing G[G]od
CHORUS: A[C]ll we want and a[F]ll we need Is fo[Am]und in You, fo[G]und in You Je[C]sus, every vic[F]tory Is fo[Am]und in You, fo[G]und in You
VERSE 2: Open w[F]ide, our he[Am]arts now to Yo[G]urs Every f[F]ear, bowed d[Am]own to Your l[G]ove That we would s[F]ee like n[Am]ever be[G]fore Give us a gr[F]eater glimpse of a ne[Am]ver-changing G[G]od
BRIDGE: [F]In Your presence th[Am]ere is fr[G]eedom [F]In Your presence [Am]we are made wh[G]oleF
Arrangement.searchtext: intro f c am g verse 1 were reaching out to welcome you god fill this place again with your song flood our thoughts with wonder and awe give us a greater glimpse of a neverchanging god chorus all we want and all we need is found in you found in you jesus every victory is found in you found in you verse 2 open wide our hearts now to yours every fear bowed down to your love that we would see like never before give us a greater glimpse of a neverchanging god bridge in your presence there is freedom in your presence we are made wholef
